query:
INSERT INTO decisions (decisionId, type, subject, policyCode, risk, requiredAuthority, status, slaDeadline, amount, beneficiary, context, decidedAt, decidedBy, justification, executionRef, createdAt) VALUES 
('DEC-2024-100', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $317,869 AUD to Lendlease Group', 'PAY-004', 'CRITICAL', 'DUAL', 'PENDING', '2025-12-04 13:06:56', '317869', 'Lendlease Group', '{"amount":317869,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Lendlease Group","purpose":"Invoice payment","reference":"INV-323989","riskSignals":["Sanctions screening: partial match"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-04 12:51:56'),
('DEC-2024-101', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $36,723 AUD to Transurban Group', 'PAY-004', 'LOW', 'SUPERVISOR', 'PENDING', '2025-11-20 21:15:12', '36723', 'Transurban Group', '{"amount":36723,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Transurban Group","purpose":"Invoice payment","reference":"INV-347567","riskSignals":["IP geolocation anomaly"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-11-20 19:15:12'),
('DEC-2024-102', 'AML_EXCEPTION', 'AML exception review for Woodside Energy', 'AML-007', 'CRITICAL', 'COMPLIANCE', 'PENDING', '2025-12-07 23:00:26', '391954', 'Woodside Energy', '{"amount":391954,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Woodside Energy","purpose":"Dividend","reference":"INV-399038","riskSignals":["Large round amount"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-07 22:45:26'),
('DEC-2024-103', 'LIMIT_OVERRIDE', 'Limit override request for Mirvac Group to $1,128,613 AUD', 'LIM-002', 'CRITICAL', 'DUAL', 'PENDING', '2025-12-09 12:30:32', '1128613', 'Mirvac Group', '{"amount":1128613,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Mirvac Group","purpose":"Loan repayment","reference":"INV-310485","riskSignals":["New counterparty relationship"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-09 12:00:32'),
('DEC-2024-104', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $89,432 AUD to BHP Group Limited', 'PAY-004', 'MEDIUM', 'SUPERVISOR', 'PENDING', '2025-12-15 10:30:00', '89432', 'BHP Group Limited', '{"amount":89432,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"BHP Group Limited","purpose":"Trade settlement","reference":"INV-456789","riskSignals":["Velocity check: 3 payments in 24h"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-15 09:30:00'),
('DEC-2024-105', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $156,780 AUD to Commonwealth Bank', 'PAY-004', 'HIGH', 'SUPERVISOR', 'PENDING', '2025-12-16 14:45:00', '156780', 'Commonwealth Bank', '{"amount":156780,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Commonwealth Bank","purpose":"Capital call","reference":"INV-567890","riskSignals":["Cross-border transaction"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-16 14:15:00'),
('DEC-2024-106', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $278,500 AUD to Rio Tinto Limited', 'PAY-004', 'CRITICAL', 'DUAL', 'PENDING', '2025-12-17 09:15:00', '278500', 'Rio Tinto Limited', '{"amount":278500,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Rio Tinto Limited","purpose":"Invoice payment","reference":"INV-678901","riskSignals":["Amount exceeds 90-day average by 2.3x"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-17 09:00:00'),
('DEC-2024-107', 'PAYMENT', 'Payment of $42,150 AUD to Telstra Corporation', 'PAY-004', 'LOW', 'SUPERVISOR', 'PENDING', '2025-12-18 11:00:00', '42150', 'Telstra Corporation', '{"amount":42150,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Telstra Corporation","purpose":"Service fee","reference":"INV-789012","riskSignals":["Device fingerprint changed"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-18 09:00:00'),
('DEC-2024-108', 'AML_EXCEPTION', 'AML exception review for Macquarie Group', 'AML-007', 'CRITICAL', 'COMPLIANCE', 'PENDING', '2025-12-18 16:30:00', '485000', 'Macquarie Group', '{"amount":485000,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"Macquarie Group","purpose":"Trade settlement","reference":"INV-890123","riskSignals":["PEP association detected","Adverse media flag"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-18 16:15:00'),
('DEC-2024-109', 'LIMIT_OVERRIDE', 'Limit override request for CSL Limited to $1,500,000 AUD', 'LIM-002', 'CRITICAL', 'DUAL', 'PENDING', '2025-12-19 08:30:00', '1500000', 'CSL Limited', '{"amount":1500000,"currency":"AUD","beneficiary":"CSL Limited","purpose":"Capital call","reference":"INV-901234","riskSignals":["Unusual account activity"]}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, '2025-12-19 08:00:00');
